show-secrets.name: Show Secrets
show-secrets.description: Use descriptions that reveal how to complete secret achievements, such as vault codes.

show_uncompleted_first.name: Show Uncompleted Achievements First
show_uncompleted_first.description: Show uncompleted achievements first in the list, then completed ones. (Does not apply to categories that use a progress bar)

use-player-colors.name: Use Player Colors
use-player-colors.description: Use your player colors for progress bars and icons.

all-discrete.name: No Progress Bars
all-discrete.description: Show all achievements with their own boxes instead of combining into a progress bar when possible. (Not recommended but you have free will so...)

hide-achievement-checkmarks.name: Hide Achievement Completion Checkmarks
hide-achievement-checkmarks.description: Hide the checkmarks that show if you have completed an achievement.

hide-category-checkmarks.name: Hide Category Completion Checkmarks
hide-category-checkmarks.description: Hide the checkmarks that show if you have completed a category.
